traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The pixie has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The pixie's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring only its pixie dust as a component: * At will: druidcraft * 1/day each: confusion, dancing lights, detect evil and good, detect thoughts, dispel magic, entangle, fly, phantasmal force, polymorph, sleep

actions.name: Superior Invisibility
actions.desc: The pixie magically turns invisible until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the pixie wears or carries is invisible with it.
